title: Ep. 479 - When Democracy Fails
description:
A giddy Nancy Pelosi pretends to be somber while signing the official impeachment resolution against President Trump and simultaneously doling out souvenir pens to her jackal colleagues. Meanwhile, Vladimir Putin moves to consolidate power in yet another blow to representative government in Russia. We will examine how and why democracy fails. Then, Trump wins big in the trade war with China, CNN releases the Warren-Bernie exchange, and finally the Mailbag.

If you like The Michael Knowles Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: KNOWLES and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at dailywire.com/Knowles
